game:ingameerror-noprivilege-buildbreak-: This ground is protected by a haven.
This plot is owned by someone else.
This plot border is part of the right-of-way.
haven:cannot-claim-border: This block is part of the border between plots and cannot be claimed.
haven:plot-already-owned: This plot already has an owner.
haven:cannot-unclaim-border: This block is part of the border between plots, which you already do not own.
haven:cannot-unclaim-not-owned: This plot is owned by someone else and cannot be unclaimed by you.
